displayProperties.name: Contender Hunter Bundle
displayProperties.description:
Contains a full set of 2021 Guardian Games Hunter universal ornaments.

Bundle price reduced for each item you already own.

displayProperties.name: Commander Zavala
displayProperties.description: The resolute Commander Zavala advises Guardians on all Vanguard-related activities.

displayProperties.name: The Drifter
displayProperties.description: The name says it all.

displayProperties.name: Red War Exotics
displayProperties.description: Exotics released during Destiny 2 - Year 1.

displayProperties.name: Devrim Kay
displayProperties.description: Ever the gentleman sniper, Devrim Kay holds fast in the wilds of the EDZ.

displayProperties.name: Amanda Holliday
displayProperties.description: Shipwright to the Tower, Amanda Holliday runs the Hangar like a finely tuned engine.

displayProperties.name: Banshee-44
displayProperties.description: Banshee-44 has lived many lives. As master weaponsmith for the Tower, he supplies Guardians with only the best.

displayProperties.name: Saint-14
displayProperties.description: A legendary hero and the former Titan Vanguard, Saint-14 disappeared into the Infinite Forest only to be later rescued by a fellow Guardian.

displayProperties.name: Spider
displayProperties.description: Unlike his Fallen brethren, the clever Spider prefers to negotiate instead of fight.

displayProperties.name: Lord Saladin
displayProperties.description: Lord Saladin, the last surviving Iron Lord, oversees the Iron Banner event: trial by combat where only the strongest survive.

displayProperties.name: Eva Levante
displayProperties.description: No longer an outfitter for heroes of the Tower, Eva now devotes her time to making sure Guardians enjoy seasonal events.

displayProperties.name: Legacy Gear
displayProperties.description: Seasonal weapons and armor are no longer available from the original quests.

displayProperties.name: Benedict 99-40
displayProperties.description: x#4(_ This maintenance frame is *amp;_ eager to assist you with #*amp; TREASURES FROM THE EMPEROR.  x#9(_

displayProperties.name: Contender Titan Bundle
displayProperties.description:
Contains a full set of 2021 Guardian Games Titan universal ornaments.

Bundle price reduced for each item you already own.

displayProperties.name: Umbral Focusing
displayProperties.description: Prismatic Lenses unlock the ability to focus Umbral Engrams and choose the rewards within.

displayProperties.name: Petra Venj
displayProperties.description: A warrior of the Reef, Petra Venj puts duty above all else.

displayProperties.name: Failsafe
displayProperties.description: Survivor of a crashed Golden Age colony ship, the AI Failsafe acts as a guide to the Vex-haunted wastes of Nessus.

displayProperties.name: Eris Morn
displayProperties.description: Once a Lightbearer, Eris Morn descended into the Hellmouth of the Moon where she lost her fireteam, her Ghost, and her Light to the Hive.

displayProperties.name: Shaw Han
displayProperties.description: A skilled Hunter, Shaw leads fireteams on dangerous missions throughout the solar system.

displayProperties.name: Petra Venj
displayProperties.description: A warrior of the Reef, Petra Venj puts duty above all else.

displayProperties.name: Shadowkeep Exotics
displayProperties.description: Exotics released during Destiny 2 - Year 3.

displayProperties.name: Ikora Rey
displayProperties.description: The wise Ikora Rey aids and advises Guardians in the protection of humanity and beyond.

displayProperties.name: Xûr
displayProperties.description: A peddler of strange curios, Xûr's motives are not his own. He bows to his distant masters, the Nine.

displayProperties.name: Beyond Light Exotics
displayProperties.description: Exotics released during Destiny 2 - Year 4.

displayProperties.name: Master Rahool
displayProperties.description: A senior representative of the Cryptarchy, Master Rahool decodes engrams and seeks the treasures of humanity's past.

displayProperties.name: Variks the Loyal
displayProperties.description: The formerly two-faced Fallen now serves as a faithful guide on Europa for Guardians and Light-bound Eliksni alike.

displayProperties.name: Season of the Chosen
displayProperties.description: A collection of focusing options from Season of the Chosen; unlocked by discovering Prismatic Lenses.

displayProperties.name: The Gate Lord's Eye
displayProperties.description: The charged eye of a Vex Gate Lord can be used to infiltrate the most protected layers of their network… and reverse engineered to confer incredible powers to its bearer.

displayProperties.name: Ada-1
displayProperties.description: Ada-1, curator of the mysterious Black Armory, is torn between upholding tradition and adapting to an ever-changing world.

displayProperties.name: Lure Mods and Upgrades
displayProperties.description: Purchase Lure mods and upgrades for use in Wrathborn hunts.

displayProperties.name: Forsaken Exotics
displayProperties.description: Exotics released during Destiny 2 - Year 2.

displayProperties.name: Cache of the Crypt
displayProperties.description: The Morning Star has crashed and the spoils amongst the wreckage are now yours to take… for a price.

displayProperties.name: Suraya Hawthorne
displayProperties.description: Once a wanderer beyond the City, Suraya Hawthorne now acts as a liaison between humanity and the Guardians.

displayProperties.name: Tess Everis
displayProperties.description: Tess Everis is an accomplished broker of stylish and highly coveted items procured from the City and beyond.

displayProperties.name: Contender Warlock Bundle
displayProperties.description:
Contains a full set of 2021 Guardian Games Warlock universal ornaments.

Bundle price reduced for each item you already own.

displayProperties.name: Lectern of Enchantment
displayProperties.description: A mechanism of the occult built by Eris Morn to harness even the most unstable of magics. Access the lectern to create gear using Nightmare Essences and collect bounties.

displayProperties.name: War Table
displayProperties.description: Center for operations against the Cabal.

displayProperties.name: Arcite 99-40
displayProperties.description: Once a champion of the Red Jack frames, Arcite now serves Shaxx and Dahlia as an aide-de-camp.

displayProperties.name: Lord Shaxx
displayProperties.description: The Crucible is the arena in which Guardians forge their Light. Lord Shaxx is the Crucible.

displayProperties.name: The Crow
displayProperties.description: The amnesiac Lightbearer once known as Prince Uldren Sov of the Reef.

displayProperties.name: Sabotage
displayProperties.description:
Assist Variks in dismantling what remains of House Salvation. With each assignment, you'll help rid Europa of Eramis's dark legacy while earning useful rewards.

Benefits gained are unlocked for all characters that have completed the quest "Reclaiming Europa."

displayProperties.name: Exo Stranger
displayProperties.description: Burdened with the knowledge one can only gain from time travel, the Stranger is here to divert us from an inescapable dark future.
